headline.text: Dr. Amitâ€™s fiction stems from the political context of Israel/Palestinian and her own experience as a Mizrahi (Arab-Jew) lesbian in Israel. Her fiction and her non-fiction work are based on her academic studies, as well as on her activist work in Israel and Palestine. The work was well-received critically and was warmly acclaimed by, among others, Amos Oz.
